TopicTitle: Using a lot of mods - early crashes - am i running out of memory?

Articles.Content:
Using 1.0.4. Have a lot of mods but most are ones I've used before and are properly updated.

Not sure if I'm just running out of memory or if it's something deeper.

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/8ivj0pbyuicf0tu/AACLdeiQM-DbnNNvfUaqKSF6a?dl=0

Game crashes when I open a game, before I can even click in to the VAB

You've already answered your own question.

Look near the end of the output log files and you'll find a few lines that state the same thing several times: "out of memory".

Your options:

Reduce the number of mods to lighten the load.

Use texture compression.

Wait for 1.1 and 64bit. But this will only really help you if your system actually has more than 4GB memory.

Edited August 22, 2015 by Tex_NL

You've already answered your own question.

Use texture compression.

Can you walk me through that process? Is there a mod that can do that? If so, which one?

Can you walk me through that process? Is there a mod that can do that? If so, which one?

Step 1: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/59005-1-0-Release-5-0-April-28-2015-Active-Texture-Management-Save-RAM!
